byooption.disclaimer: Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
byooption.longDescription: This floor mat bring a sporty touch to the footwells of your BMW. The composite technology of rubber and textile fibres means that these floor mats combine the high quality look and feel of textiles with the dirt and water-repellent properties of all-weather mats.
byooption.name: BMW Floor Mats

accessories.description: This floor mat bring a sporty touch to the footwells of your BMW. The composite technology of rubber and textile fibres means that these floor mats combine the high quality look and feel of textiles with the dirt and water-repellent properties of all-weather mats.

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+

Purchase this BMW Ultimate Care upgrade to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

Price - $600 across the board for all 2017 model/series

Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+ and BMW Ultimate Care+1 Bundle

Purchase BMW Ultimate Care+ to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model
year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

With purchasing this bundle, you will also extend your coverage with BMW Ultimate Care+1 for an additional 1 year or 14,000 miles for a total of 4 years or 50,000 miles.


Price: BMW UC+ $600 + BMW UC+1 price (which differs per 2017 model/series)
See attached price sheet


Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2017 BMW M2 Coupe models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $849 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $51,940 (MSRP of $55,595, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $3,000 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $655).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual monthly lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $3,000 down payment, $849 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.30/mile over 30,000 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $25,574.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

byooption.disclaimer: Apple CarPlay is a trademark of Apple Inc. CarPlay is compatible with iPhone 5 and later, and iOS 9.3 and later.  For best results, please use the most recent version of iOS.  Further information can be found at https://www.apple.com/ios/carplay/ Apple is responsible for all content and functionality which is displayed in the vehicle via Apple CarPlay.
byooption.longDescription: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.
byooption.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility

options.description: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.

options.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility

byooption.longDescription: The 7-speed M Double Clutch Transmission (M DCT) is integrated with Launch Control and provides optimal acceleration from a standing start with better values than can be achieved with a manual transmission.
byooption.name: M Double-clutch Transmission with Drivelogic

options.description: The 7-speed M Double Clutch Transmission (M DCT) is integrated with Launch Control and provides optimal acceleration from a standing start with better values than can be achieved with a manual transmission.
options.name: M Double-clutch Transmission with Drivelogic

byooption.longDescription: The M Driver’s Package includes a unique 1-day High Performance Driving Class which has been tailored to driving BMW M vehicles through various exercises on a racetrack, letting you explore the limits of the vehicle in a controlled environment. The Driving School is available at the BMW Performance Center East (South Carolina) or West (California).
byooption.name: M Driver's Package

options.description: The M Driver’s Package includes a unique 1-day High Performance Driving Class which has been tailored to driving BMW M vehicles through various exercises on a racetrack, letting you explore the limits of the vehicle in a controlled environment. The Driving School is available at the BMW Performance Center East (South Carolina) or West (California).
options.name: M Driver's Package

byooption.longDescription: The Executive Package keeps you comfortably focused. Quickly set your smartphone aside in the wireless charging base plate and hit the road. A Rear-view Camera and Park Distance Control (rear) keep you alert when backing up, while the automatic high beams keep you focused on the road ahead. In cooler weather, a comfortable temperature in the cockpit is enhanced via the heated steering wheel.
byooption.name: Executive Package

packages.description: The Executive Package keeps you comfortably focused. Quickly set your smartphone aside in the wireless charging base plate and hit the road. A Rear-view Camera and Park Distance Control (rear) keep you alert when backing up, while the automatic high beams keep you focused on the road ahead. In cooler weather, a comfortable temperature in the cockpit is enhanced via the heated steering wheel.
packages.name: Executive Package

byooption.longDescription: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. Working in conjunction with Park Distance Control, interactive guidelines can indicate lines that represent the vehicle’s actual path when backing up, as well as the optimal steering angle.
byooption.name: Rear view camera

options.description: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. Working in conjunction with Park Distance Control, interactive guidelines can indicate lines that represent the vehicle’s actual path when backing up, as well as the optimal steering angle.
options.name: Rear view camera

byooption.longDescription: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.
byooption.name: Heated Steering Wheel

options.description: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.
options.name: Heated Steering Wheel

byooption.longDescription: Driving at night is easier than ever when your BMW is equipped with Automatic high beams. A camera sensor in the rear-view mirror registers vehicles in front of you, oncoming traffic and the quality of road light, and automatically switches between high or low beams, as needed. This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.
byooption.name: Automatic high beams

options.description: Driving at night is easier than ever when your BMW is equipped with Automatic high beams. A camera sensor in the rear-view mirror registers vehicles in front of you, oncoming traffic and the quality of road light, and automatically switches between high or low beams, as needed. This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.
options.name: Automatic high beams

byooption.disclaimer: Requires clearly definable lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow, etc.  This feature is not a substitute for the driver's own responsibility in maintaining safe control of the vehicle.
byooption.longDescription: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. This camera- based system helps prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
byooption.name: Active Driving Assistant

options.description: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. This camera- based system helps prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
options.disclaimer: Requires clearly definable lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow, etc.  This feature is not a substitute for the driver's own responsibility in maintaining safe control of the vehicle.
options.name: Active Driving Assistant

byooption.longDescription: What’s the local speed limit? Even if there’s no sign in sight, this system helps keep you informed. Working in conjunction with the BMW Navigation system and other data, it shows speed limits on the instrument cluster display.
byooption.name: Speed Limit Info

options.description: What’s the local speed limit? Even if there’s no sign in sight, this system helps keep you informed. Working in conjunction with the BMW Navigation system and other data, it shows speed limits on the instrument cluster display.
options.name: Speed Limit Info

byooption.longDescription: A charging pocket in the center console allows you to wirelessly charge your smartphone. The charging surface provides wireless inductive charging with an LED charge-level indicator. This feature also adds a WiFi Hotspot including 3 GB / 3-month trial.
byooption.name: Wireless Charging and WiFi Hotspot

options.description: A charging pocket in the center console allows you to wirelessly charge your smartphone. The charging surface provides wireless inductive charging with an LED charge-level indicator. This feature also adds a WiFi Hotspot including 3 GB / 3-month trial.
options.name: Wireless Charging and WiFi Hotspot

byooption.longDescription: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors only in the rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
byooption.name: Park Distance Control (rear)

options.description: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors only in the rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
options.name: Park Distance Control (rear)
